channel.title: Standardization on AI in Healthcare
channel.description: Recent content in Standardization on AI in Healthcare

item.title: Healthcare Data Sources
item.description:
Welcome to the Healthcare Data Sources section. This page is a curated collection of high-quality datasets, knowledgebases, and platforms used in clinical research, biomedical informatics, and healthcare AI applications.

These resources are critical for:

  • Defining phenotypes and cohorts
  • Extracting features from EHRs
  • Building ML pipelines in healthcare
  • Creating interoperable clinical models
  • Enabling causal inference studies

üîç Featured Data Sources #

Phenotype KnowledgeBase (PheKB) #

Description:
A collaborative portal for sharing and validating electronic phenotype definitions used in observational health research.
